modal.query.info.heading: Search guide
modal.query.info.heading.subtext: Use keywords or property filters to search for resources.
modal.query.info.keyword.desc: To search for a keyword, type the word in the search box.
modal.query.info.keyword.example: A list of resources containing the keyword 'OpenShift' in any field.
modal.query.info.filter.desc: To search for resources with a given property value, type or select the property name from the autocomplete list. Then type or select the value for the selected property filter.
modal.query.info.filter.example: A list of resources with status 'failed' or 'pending'.
modal.query.info.note.label: Additional information:
modal.query.info.special.note1: You can include any combination of filters and keywords to make your search as specific as you would like.
modal.query.info.special.note2: You can apply multiple values to the same property filter, you must type or select the filter name first and then select the value. Both values will be combined into a single filter.
modal.query.remove.warning: Are you sure that you want to delete this search: '{0}'? This action is non-revertable.

searchhelp.header: Use the search command to search all of your managed clouds and retrieve a list of resources that meet a specified criteria. You select from common search criteria or enter your own string to search for.
